turquoise jewelry set

Stone is the earliest mark of human life. People use stones to hunt, fire, and build houses. Later, they discovered colorful stones such as diamonds, pebbles, crystal stones and turquoise. After carving, the stones were hung on their bodies or decorated houses to show their love for nature. These turquoise jewelry are not only elegant but also vintage and natural.

CLASSIC MEETS MODERN: Dearfoams Men’s Memory Foam Clog Slippers feature cozy twill or microsuede uppers paired with whipstitch detailing for classic comfort with a modern update; Kick back and relax while you enjoy the cozy comfort!
MEMORY FOAM INSOLE: Each slipper is fitted with a multi-density cushioned insole and memory foam for a cloud-like feeling on your feet; Whether you‚Äôre lounging on the couch or running to get the mail these slippers offer premium comfort & durability!
RUBBER OUTSOLE: With an indoor/outdoor outsole the bottom of these clog slippers features molded thermoplastic rubber for added durability and constant support whether you‚Äôre on the go or at home!

Read more

The Ultimate Comfort Experience

Unbeatable Comfort

Dearfoams is known for soft, warm fabrics and memory foam cushioning. A wide range of styles and sizes means you can find a slipper specifically crafted for all your needs!

Timeless Style

A mix of timeless looks and fresh, fashion-forward designs means there‚Äôs a slipper to fit every style. Perfect for wearing indoors at home or outdoors in the yard!

Dependable Quality

Superior materials and innovative technologies ensure a level of fit and durability that only Dearfoams can deliver.

Read more

Designed From The Ground Up For Comfort and Convenience

Indoor/Outdoor Outsole

With a rubber sole, our slippers can be worn indoors while lounging around the house or outdoors to grab the mail or walk the dog. Stylish and reliable, these cozy slippers are the best choice when it comes to comfortable and durable house wear.

Memory Foam Cushioning

Dearfoams slippers are designed with a multi-density cushioned insole with memory foam, bringing you instant comfort and relaxation.

No Sweat Comfort

Cool meets cozy with Dearfoams DF Adapt: No Sweat Comfort. Cool and fresh technology regulates foot temperature providing ultimate comfort all day long!

Machine Washable

Cleaning your Dearfoams slippers is easy! For best results, machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle and lay flat to dry. Keep your favorite slippers feeling clean and fresh all year long!

Read more

Give The Gift Of Comfort

We all know how hard it can be to shop for men, whether it‚Äôs your husband, father, son, boyfriend or bestie. With a wide selection of styles, colors, and sizes, you can‚Äôt go wrong with a pair of Dearfoams slippers. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, anniversary, holidays or just because! Dearfoams slippers are the perfect gift to slip right into!

Read more
